FOS.EditorialNote: This category was created with the wrong label;  it should be FOS protein with FOS as a synonym
FOS.Definition: A class of nuclear leucine zipper proteins (FOS, FOSB, FOSL1, and FOSL2) that can dimerize with JUN Family proteins and bind DNA as the AP-1 transcription factor complex to regulate transcription in cell proliferation, differentiation.
